name: Uranus Army prototype
description:
Keyboard- z (jump) x (shoot) arrow keys (move)

Xbox controller: A (jump) X (shoot) D-Pad and Left Joystick (move)

Prototype! If you like this, come back every Saturday/ Sunday to see new updates.

So anyways, the basic story is that aliens from Uranus have invaded Earth for a reason I'm not going to explain here! The only person that can somehow save us is you.
